name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Senior Ruby Engineer with 13+ years of experience in delivering high-performance applications across diverse industries, including healthcare and finance. Proficient in **Ruby** and **Ruby on Rails**, with a strong emphasis on TDD, continuous integration, and secure coding practices. Experienced in designing and implementing RESTful APIs and collaborating within agile development teams to enhance product delivery.

Skilled in **JavaScript/TypeScript**, and familiar with technologies such as **React** for frontend development, complemented by a robust backend expertise using **PostgreSQL**. Well-versed in DevOps practices, deploying cloud-native solutions on **AWS** while ensuring clean code principles and effective code reviews are upheld.

Additionally, I have a proven track record of leveraging AI/ML techniques within applications, including predictive analytics and automation. My comprehensive background in compliance-driven development aligns solutions with industry standards, contributing to operational excellence and reliable system performance.
